/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling city street, bathed in the soft glow of daylight. The sky above is a clear, serene blue, providing a stark contrast to the urban landscape below. Tall buildings, their facades a mix of white and gray, rise majestically on either side of the street, their windows reflecting the world around them. 

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars, mostly in shades of white and gray, are scattered across the road, some parked neatly by the sidewalk, others in motion, adding a dynamic element to the scene. Pedestrians can be seen as well, their figures small but noticeable, walking along the sidewalk, going about their day.

The perspective of the image is particularly striking. Taken from a low angle, it offers a view that looks up at the buildings and the sky, giving a sense of scale and grandeur to the cityscape.
